sections.body: What should the Internet - and all it encompasses, which means pretty much everything - really do for humanity? How should it work? How should it be governed?

sections.title: Introduction
sections.imagetext: An Opte Project visualization of routing paths through a portion of the Internet...
sections.subtitle: While early internet pioneers dreamed of an internet that would be open, free and decentralised, the story of the internet today is mostly a story of loss of control.
sections.body: Many of us feel increasingly uneasy about these developments. We live in a world where new technologies happen to us; the average person has very little agency...

sections.title: How to participate
sections.body: My Cool Project is a quest to understand how we the people, who contribute towards building the evolution of the Internet and our digital technologies, actively build a better future against a backdrop of massive social, economic, ecological and political challenges.
